what_is_noava.question: What is Noava?
what_is_noava.answer: Noava is a modern platform that helps you manage your business efficiently with advanced technology and user-friendly interfaces.

how_does_it_work.question: How does it work?
how_does_it_work.answer: Simply sign up, configure your preferences, and start using our intuitive dashboard to manage all your operations in one place.

what_are_the_costs.question: What are the costs?
what_are_the_costs.answer: We offer flexible subscription plans starting at â‚¬9.99 per month. Visit our pricing page for details on included features.

can_i_cancel_anytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
can_i_cancel_anytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without penalties or hidden costs. Your data remains accessible for 30 days after cancellation.

is_my_data_secure.question: Is my data secure?
is_my_data_secure.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR regulations.

support_options_available.question: What support options are available?
support_options_available.answer: We offer 24/7 email support, live chat during business hours, and comprehensive documentation. Premium plans include priority support and dedicated account managers.

integration_with_other_tools.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
integration_with_other_tools.answer: Yes, Noava integrates with popular tools like Slack, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, and many others via our API and pre-built connectors.

free_trial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
free_trial.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.
